short.ar: إضافة ذكية لإلغاء المتابعة على منصة X (تويتر) تقوم بإلغاء متابعة الحسابات الصغيرة والمستخدمين غير النشطين وتحمي الذين يتابعونك.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: A smart unfollowing extension for X (Twitter) that unfollows small accounts, inactive users and protects those who follow back.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,et,fa,fi,fil,:
It's in the open-source code of the Twitter algorithm: If your following-to-followers ratio is too high, your visibility will be limited. Twitter Unfollower can help you unfollow accounts you previously followed, ensuring your following number remains reasonable.

👨🏻‍💻 Features
✓ Unfollow users who do not follow you
✓ Unfollow users who you are following
✓ Filter accounts by: 
    - Unfollow users based on the range of their account followers
    - Unfollow users based on the number of days their accounts have been inactive

📌 Strategies to Prevent Being Limited
- For every 6 users unfollowed, take a 10 minutes cooldown period
- You can customize the number of people and the number of minutes for cooldown in the settings.

🩹 Intelligent error handling
- If a request error occurs, pause for 30 minutes before retrying
- You can customize the number of minutes for pause in the settings

🟢 indicates the normal time interval for requests
🟠 indicates the cooldown period's time interval
🔴 indicates the time interval for request errors

📃 How to Start Unfollowing?
- Choose the type of unfollowing
- Click the 'Start Unfollowing' button

📖❓ FAQ
❓Why can't we unfollow an unlimited number of users?
Unfortunately, Twitter has limits, and these limits vary from account to account. To prevent future lockouts or account suspension, we limit the processing time and the number of unfollows. We recommend using the extension sparingly to ensure its continuous functionality.

📬 Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

📃 Terms
You can automatically unfollow 6 users every day. Upgrade to Pro, you can unfollow 80 users per day.

🔒 Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

ℹ️ Disclaimer
Twitter/X is a trademark of Twitter/X, LLC. This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, sponsored by, or otherwise related to Twitter/X, LLC or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
